heading: HR00286
0: RESOLUTION EXPRESSING THE SENSE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO RETAIN THE EXISTING LEGISLATED MINIMUM AGE OF CRIMINAL RESPONSIBILITY (MACR) OF CHILDREN IN CONFLICT WITH THE LAW (CICL) AND INSTEAD PROVIDE FUNDING AND RESOURCES TO BETTER THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE EXISTING LAWS ON CHILDREN

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00286
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION EXPRESSING THE SENSE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO RETAIN THE EXISTING LEGISLATED MINIMUM AGE OF CRIMINAL RESPONSIBILITY (MACR) OF CHILDREN IN CONFLICT WITH THE LAW (CICL) AND INSTEAD PROVIDE FUNDING AND RESOURCES TO BETTER THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE EXISTING LAWS ON CHILDREN
